description: Manx pubs can reopen their doors today, after the scrapping of Covid-19 social distancing rules.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man pubs welcome back drinkers
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man pubs welcome back drinkers - BBC News
maintext: He said: "The brewer needs at least three weeks to brew beer and to get it into a pub and for it to be ready to serve. It will be a three-week window.
